You can't buy any decent clothes in Springfield.
I'm so bored of the stores here.
I prefer to browse the Goodwill store for used clothing.
If you really look, you can get lucky and find something nice.
The other day, I came across this beautiful cashmere scarf.
It turned out to be a Burberry!
I bought it for just three dollars and went home, all happy.
The only thing was that the scarf had a slightly musty smell.
